channel.title: Comments on: The OpenCon saga, 5 month update

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/the-opencon-saga-5-month-update/#comment-7659">Samir Hachani</a>.
Thank you for your kind and wise words, Samir. I wish I could get on with my life, but the damage that OpenCon has caused has been quite severe. I never asked for much in my life, and took little for myself, and have been left with even less now. It will be difficult to sustain myself in the future with this still hanging over my head. Either OpenCon can apologise, which they won't, or I can take legal action, which I have no real wish for. I do believe that justice finds us all eventually in one way or another though. For now, I want this resolved and out of my mind so I can move on. But it bugs me that people are going to seemingly get away with things. It will pass :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Samir Hachani.

Thank you for your kind and wise words, Samir. I wish I could get on with my life, but the damage that OpenCon has caused has been quite severe. I never asked for much in my life, and took little for myself, and have been left with even less now. It will be difficult to sustain myself in the future with this still hanging over my head. Either OpenCon can apologise, which they won’t, or I can take legal action, which I have no real wish for. I do believe that justice finds us all eventually in one way or another though. For now, I want this resolved and out of my mind so I can move on. But it bugs me that people are going to seemingly get away with things. It will pass ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Samir Hachani
item.dc:creator: Samir Hachani
item.description: Hi Jon, You proved in these lines that you are not ( could not)have been wrong.The fact you forgive proves your humanity.Let me just advise (if I may): FORGET IT and get on with your life. Your friends know and that enough and do not forget: there is justice that obeys only to truth and that is THA JUSTICE.Take care Jon.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jon,
You proved in these lines that you are not ( could not)have been wrong.The fact you forgive proves your humanity.Let me just advise (if I may): FORGET IT and get on with your life. Your friends know and that enough and do not forget: there is justice that obeys only to truth and that is THA JUSTICE.Take care Jon.
